com.zeitheron.hammercore.lib.zlib.database

Class CheckingDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zeitheron.hammercore.lib.zlib.database.CheckingDatabase

  • public class CheckingDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows to store passwords linked to usernames. Note: This only allows to verify said password by username. Database itself doesn't store any passwords!
